short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists all the file changes from your Pull Request and creates a list with Markdown syntax for your Pull Request description.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lists all the file changes from your GitHub Pull Request and creates a list with Markdown syntax ready to copy and paste on your Pull Request description.

How to use:
- Navigate to your GitHub Pull Request Files page (github.com/:owner/:repo/pull/:number/files) and click on the extension.
